Description:
Adversaries can interact with the DACLs using built-in Windows commands takeown which can grant adversaries higher permissions on specific files and folders

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Recursive Takeown
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\takeown.exe' and (command like '%/f %' and command like '%/r%')
